issue.title: [C#] NativeMemoryAllocator expose an option for clearing allocated memory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5276](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5276). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See the discussion [here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3925#discussion_r281192698).

We should expose an option on NativeMemoryAllocator for controlling whether the allocated memory is cleared or not.

Maybe we should make the default not clear the memory, that way it is the best performing by default.
